doc:
Reginald Purdell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reginald_Purdell 0 Reginald Purdell (4 November 1895 – 22 April 1953) was an English actor and screenwriter who appeared in over 40 films between 1930 and 1951. During the same period he also contributed to the screenplays of 15 feature films, and had a brief foray into directing with two films in 1937. Reginald_Purdell ( 4_November_1895 – 22_April_1953 ) was an_English_actor and screenwriter who appeared in over_40_films between 1930_and_1951 . During the_same_period he also contributed to the_screenplays of 15_feature_films , and had a_brief_foray into directing with two_films in 1937 .
